mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodAffComExclsGod Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ GOD_NO , AFF_VRSC_COM_ID , AFF_COM_ID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_AFF_COM_EXCLS_GOD WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AFF_VRSC_COM_ID = #{affVrscComId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND AFF_COM_ID = #{affComId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
